attributes.action: ban the church of scientology in the uk
attributes.additional_details: it has no professionally trained  psychiatrists or mental health workers but claims to be able to cure all mental health conditions. it has a purification program to rid the body of drugs , which has no independent scientific validation. it fails to inform new members that its core belief is in aliens. it also fails to inform new members that it will cost thousands of pounds to progress as a scientology.
